short_summary: SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) Renewal
description: SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or equivalent) Renewal
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
SAP for Sybase Support and Maintenance (or Equivalent) Renewal
### English
SW-104274 RFQ SAP for Sybase Support renewal
### French
SW-104274 DP pour renouvellement SAP pour le support Sybase

## Reference Number
SSC-24-00026064:T

## Tender Description
This tender is for the renewal of Sybase support and maintenance services for a period of one year, starting from April 1, 2024, and ending on March 31, 2025. The selected contractor will be responsible for providing technical support, maintenance, and upgrades for the Sybase system.

## Contracting Entity Information
### English
* Contracting Entity Name: Shared Services Canada
* Contracting Entity Address: 90 Metcalfe Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5N2, Canada
* Contracting Entity Contact:
	sender: Sandra Ladouceur
	phone: 613-302-0766
	fax: 613-960-6026
	email: none
### French
* Nom de l'entité contractante: Services partagés Canada
* Adresse de l'entité contractante: 90 rue Metcalfe, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 5N2, Canada
* Information de contact de l'entité contractante:
	envoyeur: Sandra Ladouceur
	téléphone: 613-302-0766
	télex: 613-960-6026
	e-mail: non

## Tender Status
This tender has expired, with the tender closing date set to March 28, 2024, at 2:00 p.m.

## Important Notes
* Submissions must be made through the Personnel and Payroll Services Shared Service (P2P) portal.
* Registration in the SSC P2P portal is mandatory for bidding and includes privileges such as submitting a response to a solicitation, receiving updates, and submitting invoices.
* Submission through P2P is mandatory, and submissions are not permitted after the tender closing date.
